definition: a block of solid substance (such as soap or wax), to form a coat over
details:
noun
- a block of solid substance (such as soap or wax)
= synonyms: bar
- baked goods made from or based on a mixture of flour, sugar, eggs, and fat
- small flat mass of chopped food
= synonyms: patty
verb
- to form a coat over
= example: to form a coat over
= synonyms: coat
